'''Dungeons Hero Skin Pack''',<ref>{{Tweet|MinecraftMarket|1584988838996643840|Your favorite @Dungeonsgame heroes are available now in a free skin pack! With 13 skins, including the four main Dungeons heroes, this Minecraft Marketplace pack allows you to dress up as Adrienne, Hex, Valorie, and more!}}</ref> also known as '''''Minecraft Dungeons'' Hero Skin Pack''', is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 13 skins of [[MCD:Hero|heroes]] from ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]''. At some point it was delisted.
